mapper.insert: insert into secondhand values (#{secondhand_seqno},#{secondhand_title},#{secondhand_writer}, #{secondhand_local},#{secondhand_price},#{secondhand_image},#{secondhand_content}, to_date(#{secondhand_date},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select secondhand_image from secondhand where secondhand_seqno=#{secondhand_seqno}
select * from secondhand where secondhand_writer like '%' || #{writer} || '%' order by secondhand_seqno desc
select * from secondhand where secondhand_content like '%' || #{content} || '%' order by secondhand_seqno desc
select * from secondhand where secondhand_title like '%' || #{title} || '%' order by secondhand_seqno desc
